nodes.text: The ComfortRide Passenger Airspeeder was a model of air vehicle used to transport people.

The ComfortRide was an airspeeder similar in appearance to the EasyRide model, but slightly longer. The airspeeder also lacked the EasyRide's antenna, but had an elongated rear and a tail-fin. The model had two seats in the front and space for at least four more passengers in the back.

The ComfortRide was one of many models of taxi airspeeders in use during the Clone Wars. Duchess Satine Kryze and her entourage used a ComfortRide speeder to travel during their stay on the planet Coruscant. The speeder was sabotaged and crashed into a skyscraper.
Two ComfortRides were used by bounty hunter Cad Bane and his crew during the rescue of Ziro the Hutt from the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center.

The model would continue to see use after the war's end. While chasing after Omega on Pantora, bounty hunter Fennec Shand commandeered a civilian's ComfortRide, but it was destroyed by Hunter's pyro denton explosive.
